commits.author: Seth MacPherson
commits.summary: Add yaml keys to symbol list

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body:
We want `key-value` in the third place as it is the more generic, allows it to be used in the all languages. Move the `mapping` specifier after it.

`punctuation.separator.mapping.key-value` → `punctuation.separator.key-value.mapping`

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Previously the comment part of this rule was actually optional which lead to any empty line and any trailing whitespace on lines being marked as a comment. Now matches any leading whitespace as `punctuation.whitespace` and matches the comment as a block to allow injections into comment content.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body:
Imported from SublimeText Packages, originally created by @FichteFoll with additional patches from @Briles and @wbond.

Known limitations:

- Most indentation is not checked, except for block scalars, where it is also not verified (i.e. highlights even if less indentation used than required).
- Properties are sometimes incorrectly highlighted for nested block collections (`- !!seq -`).

Synced as of sublimehq/Packages@c52dd91f54fd76e4457a3d91f126d5e4b4720a82

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Grammar: Remove unused rule and leading tab scoping
commits.body: These should be implemented as an injected grammar.

commits.author: René Schwaiger
commits.body:
We now use the two new folding patterns `foldingIndentedBlockStart` and
`foldingIndentedBlockIgnore` introduced with TextMate 2.0 to specify
where folding should be possible.
